abstract: According to a person briefed on the talks, the company is completing a settlement of a suit brought by three former Harvard students who contend that the original idea for Facebook belonged to them.
snippet: According to a person briefed on the talks, the company is completing a settlement of a suit brought by three former Harvard students who contend that the original idea for Facebook belonged to them.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Facebook may soon close an uncomfortable chapter in its brief history: a legal dispute over its origins.

headline.main: Facebook Reportedly Near Accord Over Origin
headline.print_headline: Facebook Reportedly Near Accord Over Origin

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Matt Richtel
